page.title: 05FAMILY LIFE
page.content: This section is on{FAMILY LIFE},in the{Blantyre/Bothwell}area.We found that the average family had two to three children.Also the families that had two children had mostly one male and one female. When we asked about their favourite music artists we found that Cliff Richard was favourite for the older section of people we interviewed.The younger section that we interviewed preferred Nik Kershaw,although the others were close behind. We then found that gardening was the favourite hobby in this area. Asda proved to be the unanimous choice for shoppers in this area. We then found that in general people go out for a meal twice a month. Also most people watch T.V. at night. As for books 50% of people liked fiction and 50% non-fiction.
